text: The Third Division South was a former 3rd tier in the English Football League. It existed between 1921 to 1958. It ran along side the Football League Third Division North. Teams could be elected to the league, or relegated from Football League Second Division allocated to one or the other according to the team's geographical position. ==Champions== ==Related pages== * Football League Third Division * Football League Third Division North Category:1920s establishments in England Category:1921 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:20th-century disestablishments in England Category:1950s disestablishments in the United Kingdom Category:1958 disestablishments Category:Football in England Category:English Football League
title: Football League Third Division South
